title: gOvindana dhyAna
sahitya:
gOvindana dhyAna balu shubhakaravO


anupallavi

  bhAvisi nODalu bahu janmagaLa pApa haravO


caraNam 1    ondAvarti neneyalu bhavabhanda khilavO handina satkrtake mundina sukrtAnanda balavO
    caraNam 2    vidha vidha sAdhanakinta idu ghanavO udharambharaNakke uDuvO vasanakke idu susAdhavanavO
    caraNam 3    shrI rAma purandara viTTala ArapAravO sEridavarige I hari dhyAna krUragae dUravO
